title: Most valuable Italian brands in 2019
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Brand Eni and lowest at Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
There is a difference of 7591.0 between the maximum Brand Eni and minimum Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
